source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_ALR]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL

  UNION ALL

 SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_CHAM]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL

  UNION ALL

  SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_IBY]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL

  UNION ALL

  SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_NEW]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL

  UNION ALL

  SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_POL]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL

    UNION ALL

  SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_PROS]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL

    UNION ALL

  SELECT [ODSBreweryCode]
      ,[FYEAR]
      ,[FMONTH]
      ,[FWEEK]
      ,[FDAY]
      ,[DEPARTMENT]
      ,[PROCESS_AREA]
      ,[PARAMETER]
      ,[ORDER_NUMBER]
      ,[IN_SPEC]
      ,[OPPORTUNITIES]
      ,[PERC_IN_SPEC]
	  ,GETDATE() as [UPDATED DATE]
  FROM [Staging].[PhyChem_ROS]
  WHERE [ODSBreweryCode] IS NOT NULL
